title: Lavish Heritage Hotel in Delaware with French Restaurant & Patisserie
description: Experience a heritage retreat at Hotel du Pont, a century-old hotel located a short stroll from the Brandywine River. Indulge in French cuisine at Le Cavalier at The Green Room, the hotel's brasserie, or satisfy your sweet tooth cravings with delicious baked goods from Spark*d Creative Pastry. The hotel's opulent Gold Ballroom, adorned with gilded rosettes and glittering chandeliers, offers a glimpse into the city's illustrious past.
offer_address: 42 West 11th Street, Wilmington, Delaware 19801, United States
